front.title: 6LoPLC: Transmission of IPv6 Packets over IEEE 1901.2 Narrowband Powerline Communication Networks

abstract.t: This document updates [RFC 4944], "Transmission of IPv6 Packets over IEEE 802.15.4 Networks", and [RFC 6282], "Compression Format for IPv6 Datagrams over IEEE 802.15.4-Based Networks", and specifies the 6LoPLC technology: the transmission of IPv6 packets over IEEE 1901.2 narrowband powerline communication networks.
